title: No.6 The Square
content:
Font: 

 Dorchester Script & Shelley Script 

Solved By: 

 [Stephen Coles](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415062321/http:/typophile.com/user/103 "View user profile.")

| [Untitled.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415062321/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled_27.png) | 29.73 KB |
author: Scowcroft

comments.content: There are two fonts here. The first line is [Dorchester Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415062321/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/dorchester-script/?refby=typographica), slanted, with some connecting strokes added. The second line is [Shelley Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415062321/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/shelley-script/?refby=typographica).
